name: HR Solution
description: Manage HR processes seamlessly, It helps HR focuses on core business whlile the system manages the administratives tasks. This tool provides visibility for management, and brings employees together.

features.name: Employee Management
features.description: Company onboard all employees, onboarded employee gets their login credential by email. this module manages employee informstion such as; profile, background education, promotions, certifications.

features.name: Inventory Management
features.description: Manages all items available for request in the company. It keeps track of volumes and notifies the inventory manager once an item falls below a threshold

features.name: Requisition Management
features.description: Each employee can make request for items in the inventory, the requested items are disbursed based on approvals

features.name: Cash Request Management
features.description: Each employee can request for cash and channel the request to the appropriate authorities for approvals

features.name: Leave Management
features.description: Leave Type (Annual, Causal, Exam etc) are created by the leave manager, and attached to each type is a number of days an employee can process.

features.name: Talent Management
features.description: The Talent Manager can assign a course or test to a department or unit. The course materials can be uploaded or share a link to the course.

features.name: Knowledge Sharing
features.description: An Employee will interesting idea can share with the rest of the team. You can target a unit, department or every one in the company

features.name: Multi Approvals
features.description: Every request made on the platform requires an approval who can either approval or decline the request. A request can go through multi-approval stage depending on the company structure.

features.name: Email Notification
features.description: Email are sent to request receivers or approvals.

features.name: Staff Exit
features.description: Employee exit request are managed with multi-approval processes

name: Car Bidding Platform
description: Sell, Bid and Order Cars Online. Get best offers on readily available Cars. Register and bid for cars from US live auctions. Order specific Cars for Customers

features.name: Browse and Listing
features.description: Search for a Car to Buy or Bid, Search based on Make, Brands or Pricing

features.name: Order Management
features.description: Have a Car in Mind? Fill a form to describe what you want

features.name: Product Management
features.description: Admin user add Cars and other relevant Information including Car Features and current condition of the Vehicle

features.name: Car Request Management
features.description: Manages all request from Customer which include customer information, interested product, Processing status, payment status, tracking and messaging (email)

features.name: Bid Management
features.description: All Bid request are managed in this module. Admin have access to all bidders request, highest bidder, lowest bidder,open or close bidding, payment, tracking and messaging

features.name: Auction Houses
features.description: Manages all auction houses information

features.name: User Management
features.description: Manages Authentication, Authorization and Profile of Signed up Users

features.name: Dashboard
features.description: Analysis Sales from orders, bidding and Car Request

features.name: Email Notification
features.description: Email are sent to customers to notified them of their Request Status

name: Performance Management System
description: An Appraisal system that implements balance score card. A balance score is strategic management performance metric that helps companies identify and improve their internal operations to help their external outcomes.

features.name: Strategy Map
features.description: Manage Company Goals, goal types and key result areas (KRA) for goals

features.name: Score Card
features.description: Develop score card sheet by inputing the key performance indicators, Performance Standard, Deadlines, Frequency of Measurement and Performance Target. Cascade score card to direct reports

features.name: Strategy Type
features.description: Define how the company KRA affects each component of the Company

features.name: Settings
features.description: Setup Company details,reporting Structures, job roles and title. Setup reporting lines among components

features.name: Reporting
features.description: Cascade and view score card sheet for all direct reports

features.name: Task Management
features.description: Receive Task assigned by direct superiors, execute, and get scored on task, and ability to do the same for your direct reports.

features.name: Performance Score
features.description: View performance for each year

features.name: User Management
features.description: Manages Authentication, Authorization and Profile of Signed up Users

features.name: Email Notification
features.description: Email are sent to customers to notified them of their Request Status

name: Feedback Monitoring System
description: Get real time feedback from your customers using various channels (mobile APP, integrated with external system via APIs)

features.name: Customization Module
features.description: Ability to customize the view on the mobile App from the backend System

features.name: Emoji Module
features.description: Ability to create various type of reactions (for example: happy, sad, angry etc)

features.name: Feedback Module
features.description: Manage all feedback received and act based on the priority level of the feedback

features.name: User Management
features.description: Manage Admin users from various regions and branch across the country. Access is based on permission level

features.name: Reporting
features.description: Generate reports

features.name: Email Notification
features.description: Instant Notification on feedback with high priority

name: Sale Manager
description: Sales Manager is a cloud based application that helps company and businesses to manage their field Sales Activities. Field Sales Manager App helps managers and senior management to track the performance of their field or remote staff in real-time and fill the revenue leaks.

features.name: Inventory Management
features.description: Once a company on boards on sale manager, the admin can add a list of all the item the company sells. And at the beginning of each month a certain number of items are assigned to the sale representative

features.name: Order Management
features.description: Sales representative can also receive order from customer and logs it on the app. The admin gets to see it and process the request.

features.name: Outlet Management
features.description: All sale rep input the information of all the customer they sell to and admin have access to them at the backend.

features.name: Sale Representative Management
features.description: Sales representative are company foot soldier that goes around to market to sell company product.

features.name: Sale reporting
features.description: Admin get real time update on sales

features.name: Point of Sales tracking and Image Capturing
features.description: At the point of sales, the app captures the sales location and asks the sale rep to take a picture of the items or outlet location.

features.name: Route Management
features.description: Sales representative plans on their movement

features.name: Customized SKU
features.description: Company can set their SKUs

features.name: Market Research
features.description: Share the competitors strategy with the office by capturing images of competitors activities on field.

name: Profile Management System
description: Manages Anglican Province, Dioceses, Archdeaconary, Parish and Priest Information across Nigeria

features.name: Province Management
features.description: Manage province information

features.name: Diocese Management
features.description: Manage all Dioceses in Provinces

features.name: Archdeaconary Management
features.description: Manage all archdeaconary in dioceses

features.name: Parish Management
features.description: Manage all Parish in Archdeaconary

features.name: Priest Management
features.description: Manage all priest information

name: Applicant Tracking System
description: This system helps to manage job seekers and profiles. Its management capabilities range from creation of profile to onboarding successful ones.

features.name: Candidate Management
features.description: Manages Candidate's Personal information, education history, work experience, language spoken, CV, cover letter, certificates (birth, nysc, professional certifications), guarantors information is being management under this module.

features.name: Candidate Rating and Tags
features.description: Recruiters can rate candidate based on some set parameters, and tag candidates based on their skill set.

features.name: Shortlist Management
features.description: With the help of filter, the recruitment officer can search for candidates based on certain criteria. The filtered candidates can then be shortlisted to proceed to the next phase of recruitment

features.name: Internal Screening Management
features.description: Recruiter further screens a shortlisted candidate based on their documents and other requirements

features.name: Documentation Management
features.description: Manage all Documents from candidates

features.name: Medical Management
features.description: Successful Candidates are schedule for medicals. The platform notifies the hospital in charge and candidates via emial notifications.

features.name: Interview Management
features.description: Create and schedule selected candidates for Interview

features.name: Mail Template
features.description: Create email templates for candidate registration, Documentation, Interview, Hospital Notification, shortlist, Notify candidate of Recruitment Job Status

features.name: Performance Setting
features.description: Create Parameters from rating candidate

name: Loans
description: Connect borrowers and Lenders together. Manage loan request, disbursement, repayment and withthdrawal

features.name: Profile Management
features.description: Manages Lender and Borrower Profile, Personal Information, Addresses (Home and Office),Bank Information, Credit Score Rating

features.name: Vault Management
features.description: As a Lender, specify amount available to borrow, interest rate per month and requirements

features.name: Loan Request
features.description: Specify how many you need, maximum interest rate, repayment plans (daily, weekly and monthly) and search for lenders

features.name: Repayment Plan
features.description: Based on the plan selected, create a payment schedule for repayment

features.name: Peer to Peer
features.description: Peer a Borrower to a Lender or vice versa

features.name: Loan Market
features.description: A Lender can access list of borrowers request, the same applies to Borrower

name: Feed Formulation
description: Manage feed Ingredient, formualtion feed for chicken using optimized algorithm

features.name: Ingredient Management
features.description: Manage all ingredients.

features.name: Feed Formulation
features.description: Select 2 to 4 ingredients for mixing, and algorithm will calculate the quantity of each ingredient to mix to achieve the desired protein level

features.name: Result Analysis
features.description: Anaylse feed result with charts

features.name: Multi Languages
features.description: App is available in English, Swahili and Amharic

name: ECommerce
description: Online Store. Buying and Selling of babies, kids toys

features.name: Browse and Listing
features.description: View all product available or search for products

features.name: Cart and Checkout
features.description: Add products to Cart and Checkout to payment

features.name: Payment Integration
features.description: Payment gateway is integration to collect for the seller

features.name: Product Tracking
features.description: Tracking your purchase online with a tracking ID

description: Manages Anglican Province, Dioceses, Archdeaconary, Parish and Priest Information across Nigeria

features.name: Province Management
features.description: Manage province information

name: Field Sales App
description: Sales Manager is a cloud based application that helps company and businesses to manage their field Sales Activities. Field Sales Manager App helps managers and senior management to track the performance of their field or remote staff in real-time and fill the revenue leaks.

features.name: Sell Assign Products
features.description: View and Sell from your inventory. Capture the gelocation of sale and take pictures of current sale point

features.name: Outlet Management
features.description: View all your customer. Add new customer

features.name: Market Research
features.description: Share market insight with the decision maker. Take pictures of competitors product and write about it.

features.name: Analysis
features.description: Analysis your sales per, day, weekly and monthly

features.name: Product Request
features.description: Request for products when out of stock

features.name: Notification
features.description: Get Notified when new products are assigned
